website_summaries.verdict: Over 4,000 customers have used this ultra-thin screen protector for their Apple Watch Series 3 (42mm).
pros: This case was designed to protect the screen and all four sides of your Apple Watch from dents, scratches, and smudges
Keeps oily fingerprints off your screen
Two-pack lets you swap cases when one gets dirty
cons: Moisture and perspiration may become trapped between the case and the watch, causing it to fog

customer_reviews.title: Great protection!
customer_reviews.text: I'm very happy with this case. I wanted something to protect my new watch, but would not detract from the looks of the watch. I think this serves that purpose. It was very easy to put on, and I would definitely order again! UPDATE: I love this case so much that I ordered a 2nd! I wanted to wash the first one, so I put on the new one, and plan on swapping them out periodically.
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: I love it/ husband hates it
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two- one for me and one for my husband. He didn’t like it because it would get water under the cover when he washed his hands. I, on the other hand, love it and haven’t got any water under it ( although I don’t wash above my wrists when washing hands 🤣). I scratched my last Apple Watch by accidentally banging my wrist into the corner of our granite counter, so I knew I wanted some great protection for my next one. I do believe this is it! It has a very low profile and covers every surface that could get bumped or scraped.
customer_reviews.author: Amy E Williams

customer_reviews.title: Best Watch Protector!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the BEST watch protector out there! You just squeeze your watch into it and it gives full all around coverage! 5 months everyday use and going strong!
customer_reviews.author: MDav

customer_reviews.title: Just saved my watch!!
customer_reviews.text: Great screen projector!! It was super easy install! It actually just saved my watch when I bumped it up against something. Watch still responds very quickly with the cover on.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Soft clear, fits perfect, and touch works great.
customer_reviews.text: Clear Silicone cover works perfect for protecting your watch from scratches and reasonable bumping. I get to see the watch face in full view with out those heavy duty drop cases and bumper guards obstructing my watch. This is not a hard plastic clear case. It’s soft and fits nicely over the watch face and l have no issues with touch features.. it’s a good purchase for a Apple Watch. I’ve used this style cover for both my old gen 1 watch and gen 3 as they have them available for each type gen.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It is a good, tight fit
customer_reviews.text: I've had this case on my watch for a few months now and have been pleasant;y surprised! I bump my wrist a lot and have had no breaks, scratches, dings, etc. on the surface of my watch. It is a good, tight fit. The watch has no trouble reading the commands of my fingertips. For the price, I would highly recommend this case!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not even noticeable!
customer_reviews.text: It fits really well, and I can’t even tell it’s on it! I bump my watch a lot on things and was really worried about scratching the screen, but now I don’t have to worry about that anymore! I love it! And it’s really easy to still be on my watch! I thought i would have to press down hard on it to get a response on my watch but I can use it as normal as I did before putting it on!
customer_reviews.author: Brenna Seifert

customer_reviews.title: Almost invisible protection
customer_reviews.text: The case arrived on time and in great condition. Even before I consulted the instructions, I knew how to install it. At first glance, the plastic seemed cloudy but I quickly discovered that this was a trick of the light, and that when I use it under normal circumstances, the case seems almost invisible. I have worn it for more than a week and it seems quite durable and effective at deflecting damage to my Apple Watch.
customer_reviews.author: Mark McLeod

customer_reviews.title: Screen protector
customer_reviews.text: This product is great I just got it and it completely covers the screen and the touch screen still works really well. It a little hard to get on but it fits really tight
customer_reviews.author: cat call

customer_reviews.title: Sleek. Comfortable. Doesn’t take away from the Apple Watch look.
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfectly. Love it. Very sleek I like that it doesn’t take away the beauty or color of the Apple Watch and doesn’t add any weight. One flaw is that it looks spotted on the screen but that doesn’t seem to bother me much. Everything else is awesome. If your looking for sleek protection that doesn’t take away from the look of your Apple Watch this is the product for you. And the glass screen protector gift is awesome as well. Although I’m going to use that whenever I decide to take this awesome protection off my watch.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Pellizzari

customer_reviews.title: this product was a waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, this product was a waste of money. The case does not operate as advertised. It protects my apple watch, but at the cost of not being able to use my touch screen. I have to take the screen protector off in order to use my apple watch. Also, over time the case accumulates moisture between the case and the screen, which once again, screws with my touch screen and damages it a bit. Amazon honestly has a horrible apple watch cover selection. Id suggest going somewhere else for a case.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Quinones

customer_reviews.title: Great Case and Screen protector
customer_reviews.text: Great slim one piece Case and Screen protector! Easy tto install and very ergonomically functional one piece case and screen protector. Touch screen remains sensitive and buttons remain easily accessible without any hindrance!, Color tone is nice and the clear looks good on my rose gold device. Glad I found this item! Thanks!😎
customer_reviews.author: ZenaA-SpiritWarrior

customer_reviews.title: Great Watch Case
customer_reviews.text: Great cover. Came with a small tempered glass also that I did not install b/c it looked kinda small and would not protect the sides. The clear cover was what I really wanted. Fits good and snug. No issue with the touch screen. I bought a leather band for it from another seller, as you can see from the pics. Look at my reviews for details on the leather band. Would buy this case again if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Salseroboy

customer_reviews.title: Can't go wrong with Julk!
customer_reviews.text: I love this new product for my Apple Watch Series 3 42mm. It protects from smudges from the oils on my fingers and also protects the face and the chrome from damage from hard surfaces as my arm swings. As you can see in my photo you barely notice that the watch is fitted with, the Julk iWatch Screen, an all-around neatly fitted protective case; and, it is thin not thick and bulky. It is easy to put on. I have screen protectors and cases for my Apple iPhone why not for my Apple Watch. The aesthetic of this protective case is a big plus in maintaining my watch's excellent condition.
customer_reviews.author: Gail D Tondu

customer_reviews.title: Not for active people.
customer_reviews.text: This cover is excellent for a passive person but not for someone who is physically active. Sweating leads to condensation between the watch and the cover and make the watch unresponsive to touch. Further downside is that to clear it you must remove at least one of the bands to remove the Julk cover. I did not like this product because it let sweat get between it and the watch. That said, the company did immediately refund my money. I really appreciate their responsiveness. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Mary lewis

customer_reviews.title: Little hard to get on, got finger prints on ...
customer_reviews.text: Little hard to get on, got finger prints on inside of case while putting in on and that may drive me crazy. Other than that its exactly what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: A must have!!!
customer_reviews.text: I picked this up after I noticed a scratch on my Apple Watch. When I first got it I was not a fan. I felt like it made the watch too bulky. I kept using it anyway I am so glad I did. My lab got ahold of the watch and chewed it all up. Aside from one or two scratches on the back this case saved my watch. I attached a pic of the case post chew.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Stergiotis

customer_reviews.title: Not useful 100% of the time.
customer_reviews.text: This is not a good option for someone who wants to protect their apple watch. Easy enough to install, however once a bit a moisture gets under the protector you can't use the touch screen. I don't sweat heavily, but just a small amount is all it takes. If the protector would fit more snugly on the screen it may be better. Does it protect the apple watch screen? yes. Can you use the watch while it's on? Not always.
customer_reviews.author: Don Quixote

customer_reviews.title: This product is all right. I was very on ...
customer_reviews.text: This product is all right. I was very on the fence about it because of all the mixed reviews and I can see both perspectives. I hit my wrist against walls and edges of tables all the time so I definitely needed something for protection, and it is true this protector is very slim and sleep. But be aware, it does create air bubbles when you sweat or if you shower with it! Those reviews are not a lie so pay attention to that if you think that is something that would bother you. Overall I don’t mind it, but to be honest it does affect the sensitivity of the touch screen.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It’s fits like a glove on my Apple Watch which is a good thing , but after one workout the sweat 💦 from my arm started to get underneath the plastic protector which caused me not to be able to use the controller of the touchscreen. If you’re getting this protector for regular usages then it’s a great product to buy. If you’re going to be working out a lot I wouldn’t suggest getting this one at all
customer_reviews.author: Kerline Mereus

customer_reviews.title: Basic protection for Series 3 watch
customer_reviews.text: It works well as some basic protection and protects the screen as stated. If you sweat a lot, it will build up fog between the screen and the protector. It covers the button on the side, so it can help to keep dirt and debris out of that area also. It also covers the sides of the digital crown so that it is harder to accidentally turn. This is one of many cases/covers that I've tried on my watch, and it is much less obtrusive than some of the larger, bulkier ones. It is also not as noticeable since the entire case is clear.
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: Distorts watch clarity!
customer_reviews.text: The “clear” case has a dot pattern over the watch face. Completely destroys the sharpness of the watch. It did fit well, but will also retain water under the face if it gets wet. I know the watch is water proof, but can’t imagine water sitting on the face for long periods of time is optimal.
customer_reviews.author: Edwin Grabill

customer_reviews.title: I used this only once and immediately didn't like it. The concept of having a clear entire ...
customer_reviews.text: I used this only once and immediately didn't like it. The concept of having a clear entire cover over your watch is nice, but the upper right side of the cover doesn't sit flush with the watch and is slightly raised. This makes it so when I tap my watch, i can visually see the entire front go up and down. Also, when washing your hand or if anything gets under there, its pretty annoying and there is no real easy way to clean it or dry it. You basically have to take off your apple watch strap, then take the case off. Dry/clean it, then put everything back on.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Almost amazing.
customer_reviews.text: Okay so does this product work? Yes, depending. If you go to the gym with your watch or sweat at work a lot the moisture gets trapped in between the watch and screen causing it to not activate. Then you must pull the protector off use your shirt or cloth to clean the moisture out put the screen back on and it will happen again in like 15 min of sweating. I like the idea it looks decent just slightly bulky not bad though. Absolute designer flaw that makes this product absolutely unusable trash. Maybe this is a common problem with these types of cases I have no idea. Still, trash.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Not for an active lifestyle
customer_reviews.text: At first this screen protector was great. After using it during a workout, sweat accumulated under the screen and pretty much made the touch screen useless. After about 3 months the case turned a dirty yellowish color despite cleaning it every time I used it after working out (it’s extremely hard to get in and off). It did keep me from scratching the screen of my watch at the expense of large marks down the rubber that would not buff off. For $8 it’s not a complete waste but I wouldn’t recommend it to those looking to workout in it or wash your hands with it on.
customer_reviews.author: Adams

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work when water gets under the case
customer_reviews.text: Waste of money. Whether it was washing your hands or sweating at the gym, if any water got under the case, the touch screen on the watch would not work. When I was at the gym and I would sweat, it would get under it and I couldn’t turn the exercise tracker off when I was done without completely taking the watch and cover off.
customer_reviews.author: Brandy

customer_reviews.title: Supcase misleading
customer_reviews.text: Don’t recommend this as a “buy togeheir” with the excellent supcase. Doesn’t fit well. Skip this if u buying the supcase unicorn beetle band for ur I watch....it doesn’t fit and it’s nit needed if I bave a sapphire crystal. u will see. Infuriating...I should have known as physics and geometry imply u can’t add this to ur watch and expect a good fit.
customer_reviews.author: grm101112

customer_reviews.title: scratches extremely easy *updated* September 2018
customer_reviews.text: had my coat on while wearing my watch, and i guess the button my coat sleeve scratched this rubber case. I do not recommend this case unless you want to buy a new one every couple weeks at almost $9 a pop. Update: Customer support contacted me to try and resolve the issue for the bad experience by refunding more money, although it took them since February 2018 and its now September 2018 to attempt to make things right, they still made an attempt and for that I am up my stars from 1 to 2 stars based on customer support.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Thought it would work but it just won’t once you get your watch wet!
customer_reviews.text: I did love the idea of having a clear protector over my Apple Watch but once I put the clear case over the watch and got it wet, I couldn’t click on the screen because of the moisture residue that was under the case and on top of the watches screen. I had to keep taking the case off every time I got the watch wet just so I could use the watch again and click on the screen. Returning it now, wish it would have worked.
customer_reviews.author: D. Deckard

customer_reviews.title: Will NOT fit apple watch!  It's too large and loose and prevents touch recognition.
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't fit the apple watch. It's too large and it slides around loosely, and even worse it often won't allow your touch to be registered on the watch so you'll be tapping over and over like a crazy person trying to just touch the acknowledge alarm while it's blaring and you're frustrated. Don't buy this piece of junk.
customer_reviews.author: Noneatallhere

customer_reviews.title: Good way to protect but.......
customer_reviews.text: Liked it a lot at first but then i noticed when you drag your finger on face there’s a gripping feeling I didn’t like, like it didn’t feel like the watch screen without the cover so i discovered a harder clear shell that snaps on watch face and it feels just like the watch face does so i found my solution to durability and functionality. I dont wear my watch at work as i work construction and even with protection it would get dusty and dirty under everywhere and it would be in the way when i half to mix mortar or concrete for repairs. Yea i repair houses as my job and its always a dirty job.
customer_reviews.author: JCTop Contributor: Batman

customer_reviews.title: Fits great, looks great
customer_reviews.text: Fits great, looks great! The only problem is if you get it wet at all the water gets trapped between the case and the watch. I try not to get mine wet and take it off when I shower so it’s not a big deal. Very clear looking and responsive to touch. I feel that my device is safe from me and my clumsiness of always hitting my watch into anything and everything. The price is worth it for under ten bucks, it’s a no brainer.
customer_reviews.author: kcb2789

customer_reviews.title: Easy On Protection
customer_reviews.text: My Apple Watch 3 is about a week old so I did some research on how to keep it from getting banged up. My Julk Case for my 42 mm Apple Watch 3 arrived today. Delivery was fast and on time. It was very easy to install on my watch. The case looks great and doesn’t take away from the look of the Watch. Also got one for my wife’s 38mm Apple Watch. I would recommend anyone looking to protect their investment to get this case.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Alston

customer_reviews.title: Not compatible with working out
customer_reviews.text: The screen is easy to install and definitely does it’s job of protecting the watch. For most applications it’s fine. However if you are a person that works out with your watch or does any activity where I’ll get wet this protector will not work. Even with just sweating from a work out the area between the protector and the watch gets moist and won’t dry. So the touchscreen functionality does not work. I’ve found the same thing happens on both the 38 mm and 42 mm versions. I tried installing another set just to see if I’d gotten a bad one initially but I’ve had the same problems.
customer_reviews.author: Holly Schaffter

customer_reviews.title: Would Never Work in Waterworld
customer_reviews.text: In theory, this is a great product. Unfortunately, if ANY amount of moisture gets between the protector and the watch face it becomes useless. It’s very well crafted and if you are looking for a protector to use in strictly arrid climates and if you don’t sweat whatsoever, or if you only need something to protect against banging against rocks without having to actually access any functions it would be fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: LRHR

customer_reviews.title: So why only 3 stars?
customer_reviews.text: Pro: The case for the Apple watch arrived quickly and on inspection seems like a great idea. The installation was simple and fairly easy, I liked the idea that my watch screen was protected. Con: If you exercise or work outside it will build up condensation under the case when you sweat or if it is raining. It almost seems as if it attracts moisture under the case. I don't know how long it would take to dry out again on its own, because I removed it and dried off my watch. The repeated task of taking it off, drying it out, and reinstalling isn't worth the protection.
customer_reviews.author: DarrellC

customer_reviews.title: it is a perfect fit for my apple watch series 3 (42mm)
customer_reviews.text: it is a perfect fit for my apple watch series 3 (42mm). No cover in the back so feels like nothing is on the watch itself and actually makes my watch look better with glossy finish. It was hard to put on because it's a such a PERFECT FIT for the watch. Never encountered any cover that fit so perfectly before. I bought 1 more for my friend as a gift cause I love it so much. Would buy it again and again.
customer_reviews.author: Jae-Z C

customer_reviews.title: Great, with flaws
customer_reviews.text: It does what is says it’s supposed to do. It protects the screen of an Apple Watch. However, two annoying things about it 1. If it gets wet enough, water gets under it onto the screen, which renders the screen unresponsive. You have to remove the protector and dry the water. Which leads me to the next annoyance 2. You have to take the bands of the watch off every time you need to remove this cover. It doesn’t sound like much until you have to do it a couple of times a day Other than that, it does work, you just have to endure a few things
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Plastic yellows quickly, needs frequent cleaning
customer_reviews.text: This is NOT a hard case the plastic is very soft. And, unfortunately, the fit is loose enough for water and small particles of debris to get in between the screen and the protector which makes it essential to remove and clean the plastic. My biggest disappointment is that after just a few weeks of use I noticed that the clear plastic begins to take on a yellow hue. The discoloration is not that noticeable unless you remove it and set it on something white like a sheet of blank paper. All things considered, I would not recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Leader Desslok

customer_reviews.title: Good product, but here are the downsides...
customer_reviews.text: I like this product, and I have bought it twice. I do want to say that the plastic does not stay clear. It turns yellow tinted after a few months. Another thing I have noticed is if you get bug repellant on it when spraying yourself, it leaves spots on the plastic and looks bad. If could be better if these two issues were taken care of somehow. It does protect my watch, but the cover will scratch and then not be as nice looking. Also when water gets under it, and its kind of easy to happen, you have to remove it and dry it for touch screen operation to work properly.
customer_reviews.author: Audiobookman

customer_reviews.title: Don’t get it wet
customer_reviews.text: The product works well enough. It is really good at protecting the screen. You can definitely tell there is a barrier on the screen and have to push a little harder to make the watch respond. The problem I had was that I am a surfer and use my watch to stay in touch while I’m in the water. Any water at all that gets under the protector makes it so the screen does not respond at all. This makes it useless to me. The only way to get it working is to remove the protector and dry everything. Which is a process since you have to remove the band to get the protector off.
customer_reviews.author: Dave G

customer_reviews.title: Fixed a Cracked Screen
customer_reviews.text: I cracked my watch screen even though it is a sapphire crystal display. The glass was cracked so bad there are sharp edges that can poke your skin if you attempt to use the screen. Official Apple repair would've cost the same as a replacement watch. This simple protector allows me to continue using my apple watch as it completely covers and keeps the cracked edge in place. In terms of touch screen responsiveness I would give it a 8/10 as sometimes I have to tap a few times to get it to register.
customer_reviews.author: Seizure

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: First product I ordered got lost in the mail so had to order another after getting refunded. It was pretty tricky to get on my Apple Watch, but I got it on there! I was afraid I’d tear the product. It holds up well. It’s tricky to get off. I think it holds up pretty good to scratches, although there’s some minor leftover scratches on the one I have after using it for a few weeks. Overall it’s a good product to use to protect the screen of your watch. Better than nothing at all!
customer_reviews.author: L. Frederick

customer_reviews.title: One big problem!
customer_reviews.text: The idea of this product is great and I definitely needed a cover for my watch. The issue I had was that as I sweated, condensation developed between the watch screen and the case. The moisture rendered the touch screen useless. I had to take the cover off to remove the moisture, more than once. This was an inconvenience. I would have given it a 5 stars if not for the above issue, but it is a BIG issue.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Jones

customer_reviews.title: If you’re not sweating a lot, this cover is great. If you are - not so much
customer_reviews.text: If you’re using it just for a watch or walks/runs, it’s GREAT! If not, read on. I loved this cover - until my first really intense workout. When I was just running and not sweating much, it was GREAT! But once I did my outdoor HIIT workout, sweat got underneath the cover and the touchscreen wouldn’t work. I had to completely remove the cover (which involves taking off the bands) to stop my workout. Once this happened after three different workouts, I took it off. My son had the same issue after the workouts.
customer_reviews.author: Angela C. Owen

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price for piece of mind!
customer_reviews.text: Very soft so and have had scuffs and scratches which so far I’ve been able to rub out, but glad it is on this and not the watch face itself! I do woodworking and computer repair and it is very nice to not have to worry about damaging my watch. I have one of the 42mm Apple watches and it fits perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: BONUS- you get 2 in the package! Great item, easy to install and you definitely need one, especially if you have a toddler and are running around the park with them. You'll find out how easy it is to bang the watch face up against all kinds of things so this protection is a must have. This plastic isn't too thick and is flexible enough to get on easy as well as come off easy. There's slits where needed so you can put new bands on and off without much problem. Would defnitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: S. Jernigan

customer_reviews.title: Does the job but gets foggy.
customer_reviews.text: It does the job wonderfully. The cat knocked my watch onto the floor and managed to make the screen pop off though it still works. So I bought these, and have one on to keep the screen safely on the phone until I can take it in to get repaired. The only thing I don’t like about it is that some sort of whitish fog collects on the underside between it and the watch, which you can see in the picture. So I am down to just being forced to either ignore it or clean it weekly at least with rubbing alcohol or glass cleaner. So annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Susannah

customer_reviews.title: Does protect but it's annoying in other areas
customer_reviews.text: This covers my watch and protects it but if one drop of water gets on it I have to remove the whole thing and wipe down my watch and the case. It gets water underneath it and is quite annoying. It does protect my watch but to have to remove it a zillion times is annoying. It also scratches and gets paint scratches on it from ... I honestly don't even know?! It's like paint from my wall or cabinet gets on it if I brush against a surface in my house. And um, we haven't painted our house in years so no clue what the heck that's about.
customer_reviews.author: stacythetrainer

customer_reviews.title: Not the best
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to like this case. It completely covers your watch which is a good thing, but if you sweat at all (say after running or being outside when it’s humid) your sweat all pool between the screen and case. This can’t be good for the watch. So after running I have to take the case off each time and wipe it down so I don’t ruin my watch. Also with this on the touch screen is not as responsive as it is without it and that can be frustrating as well.
customer_reviews.author: UtahRunner5

customer_reviews.title: Not Overly Impressed
customer_reviews.text: I'm giving this a 2 star rating only because the silicone does protect the face of your watch. However, every time you wash your hands, wash your face, swim, etc you have to dismantle the entire watch to get the water out from behind the cover. Until you do, your watch doesn't react to your touch rendering it basically useless. I feel this product is missing the mark on this and they need to figure out how to make it so water doesn't get under it.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Bylow

customer_reviews.title: Prone to condensation while active
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a means of covering my screen while working out and playing sports but ironically enough, that is the only time where it renders the device completely unusable. When you start getting sweaty, condensation builds up inside the cover and you can no longer use the touchscreen or sometimes even see the screen at all. I give it two stars because the fitment was good but other than that, the design needs to be improved or a different material needs to be used.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph

customer_reviews.title: Solid fit and good construction
customer_reviews.text: The product was shipped fast and received in a short period of time. The case was easy to put over the watch. It comes with wipes to clean your watch face. I would recommend first doing that before you place it on. Once on it covers the watch very well, it fits great and covers all sides of the watch. I would highly recommend using this product. For the price of your Apple Watch it's worth the added protection. Prior I had a Fitbit Blaze and did not cover it and my dog's claw placed a scratch across the watch face. Once I bought my Apple Watch this protector was the my next purchase and so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: CB

customer_reviews.title: Okay for daily wear
customer_reviews.text: These clear cases are great for daily wear and I am very glad that it comes with two. I’ve had mine a couple of months now and I will say that over time they start to turn yellowish. In about another month or so I will likely use my second one. If you like to exercise or even sweat the smallest amount, do be aware that this cover is not going to protect from that. Occasionally I have noticed some liquid sliding underneath the cover. I would recommend though and would probably buy again for the price.
customer_reviews.author: BrandyUnique

customer_reviews.title: Good protection.  Less sensitive touch.  Foggy after sweating.
customer_reviews.text: The touch function requires significantly more pressure to work, especially when swiping to different clock faces. The other negative has been the fogging after sweating. It was great until I worked outside and sweat got under the protector. I’ve not been able to get it clean and clear again. I moved to the second one in the package which is working well so far, but I’ve not been gardening again with it since. It is great protection, but I’m not thrilled with the “barriers” to use it (press hard and foggy). I’m hoping to keep this second one clear.
customer_reviews.author: Willow

customer_reviews.title: Okay option
customer_reviews.text: I like the overall function of this screen protector, but it does scuff up easy and the plastic does yellow over time. Additionally, if it gets wet from swimming, dishes, showing, watering the plants etc, you have to take it off and clean it out. The little plastic bit that goes on the outside of the part where the bands slide through is cumbersome to install, as it keeps trying to slip into the holes for the watch band.
customer_reviews.author: Taiya114

customer_reviews.title: Do not recommend!!
customer_reviews.text: I took the screen protector back off within the first 24 hours. I wash my hand often due to my job and water quickly got under the screen and then the touch screen no longer works. I don’t recommend if you work in the medical field or any job where you have to wash you hands often. It’s not possible to take the screen off every time you wash your hands and I don’t want to take my whole watch off repeatedly through out the day.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Actually it works good for protecting your Apple Watch. It’s a little bulky but I’m liking it more
customer_reviews.text: Mine had scratches on the cases when I received them. I was expecting something nicer. It will work just fine but adds bulk to your Apple Watch since it’s a soft TPU material. I could live without them. Mine didn’t look anything like picture. One good thing it was inexpensive. 😐 After messing around with it , the sensitivity is very good on the touchscreen on the Apple Watch. I’m starting to like it better. It protects the Watch really good. Wish it was thinner. I’ve raised my stars review.
customer_reviews.author: Bobby

customer_reviews.title: A pain to install and remove.  Fogs up if you sweat.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this about two years ago and it's been sitting in a drawer ever since. You have to remove the watch band to take this on and off. I used it maybe twice while skateboarding. It fogged up terribly. It has since yellowed as these plastics tend to do. It's a sturdy, thick flexible silicone like plastic that no doubt would save your watch from impacts and scratches but not worth the trade-offs.
customer_reviews.author: JS

customer_reviews.title: Scratch resistant, but not good for active people
customer_reviews.text: It works great in that it protects from scratches, but as many reviewers have stated, it is huge flaw if you get any kind of moisture in it especially if you perspire. Be prepared to take it off, clean it and let it dry, then reinstall. It is kind of difficult to install, but I guess in order to fit snuggly it is designed like that. It will also change color in the long run as it is not meant to last a very long time. It does what it is supposed to, but I think with the flaws it should cost less. Would not recommend for active people.
customer_reviews.author: LN

customer_reviews.title: Horrible- traps water so touch screen won’t work
customer_reviews.text: If you get your watch wet- even just washing your hands, the screen protector traps water, and your touch screen doesn’t work. It’s useless. Sadly, I ordered this twice , the first order didn’t show up, and because of a death in the family, I didn’t notice timely enough so I reordered. Unless you never get your waterproof watch wet... don’t bother ordering this. I’ll stick to the stickers that lasted 4 months each
customer_reviews.author: julia roberts

customer_reviews.title: Not a good idea
customer_reviews.text: You own an Apple Watch and you probability use it as you exercise, or maybe you live somewhere that’s humid.. What happens is moisture will naturally get between the face of the watch and the plastic protective cover. When that happens it starts to compromise the watch and the ability to use the touch screen. Eventually this inexpensive cover will damage your expensive watch. The concept is there but the exaction isn’t..
customer_reviews.author: Consumer of Stuff

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I adore these. Fits snuggly, very protective. My only issue is really that I'm OCD - the first scratch on the plastic drove me crazy. So I just bought another set. Either way, this works! I don't suffer from the water issues bc I already avoid putting the watch into water when washing hands and going into the shower. But were I to go swimming, I would just dry it after or take off the cover. I mean, what's more important, protecting the glass or being able to wash your hands with soap and water near your watch?
customer_reviews.author: Rene Gordon

customer_reviews.title: Very Annoying DO NOT BUY if you plan on using apple watch
customer_reviews.text: After receiving my case, I put it on my apple watch right away. It was very easy to put on my apple watch. It is a snug fit and is protecting my watch very well. I was very happy at the beginning but now recently after washing my hands water always seems to get in the case and the apple watch does not understand that I am trying to touch it because of the water. The water even affects the watch because when i turn my wrist for the watch to turn on it wont because of the water. I am extremely disappointed because I think it would be a good case as protection but is not user-friendly at all.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works but sticks to screen weirdly if moisture gets underneath
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to like this screen protector, I really did. However, I had touch screen issues from day one. I cleaned the screen before putting this on and everything. I found myself tapping things several times for the tap to register, then I one day I noticed that moisture somehow got under the protector and was causing it to stick to the screen weirdly. I stopped using it.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy

customer_reviews.title: Couldn’t be happier
customer_reviews.text: The screen protector was everything I expected and at a great price. Previously I had purchased a guard for $30 and three screen protectors at $15 a piece. Those screen protectors were difficult to mold around the beveled edge and each had begun to peel eventually. The guard wasn’t a great deal either since the finish began flaking off. This clear plastic screen and edge protector was very easy to install and provides better protection to the screen. The touch screen function was my biggest worry because of the thickness. I’m happy to report the touch screen works perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Leirer

customer_reviews.title: Works great if you never sweat, otherwise it's useless.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to protect my series 3 from scratches. The day I got it I installed it which wasn't that easy but doable. Then I mowed the lawn. Took a break to drink some water and noticed gaps between the case and screen and the watch was completely unusable since sweat found its way between the case and screen. Took the case off and thew it in the trash. Just useless. Didn't even bother with a return process. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Good for the money
customer_reviews.text: For the price it is worth it. Slips on easily and does it’s job and protects the screen. Some down falls: If you get it wet or sweat while working out it gets in between the watch and this and makes it so The screen will not read your touch and it will not work. So you have to remove the protector and dry it then put it back on. Also, the color does change over time it starts to turn slightly yellow. Other than that it’s great.
customer_reviews.author: BritnieHope

customer_reviews.title: Works good until...
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put on. The crown, side button, and band release buttons all work great. I loved this case...until I went outside to do some yard work wearing my watch. I worked up a sweat and some seeped under the case making the screen unusable. It would not respond to any touches. I removed the case, cleaned and dried the watch and case, and life was fine. That is until I washed my hands while wearing my watch. Some water seeped under the case and once again the screen would not respond to any inputs. The case was nice for a few days but is now collecting dust
customer_reviews.author: Dave T

customer_reviews.title: Turn Your Apple Watch Into A Wrist Aquarium!
customer_reviews.text: If you are a human being you will sweat. It’s just the way we’re built. If you sweat even a little tiny bit while using this product it will turn your Apple Watch into a fish bowl! With sweat between this and the face it will barely function. You then have to take everything apart and dry it out and clean it and start over. It does a good a good job at protecting your watch, but it also provides a great home for aquatic life... 9-10-19 Giving one star. Not worth the continued aggravation...
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Pitts

customer_reviews.title: Reliable maker of protectors for various types of digital products
customer_reviews.text: I use Julk protectors with my Android phones for good reason: one saved the life of a prized phone I accidentally dropped on a brick patio! So when my wife asked me to buy a protector for her new iWatch, I immediately bought her (through Amazon) this Julk protector. It's works great. It's already averted a couple catastrophes -- one drop, one spraying with dishwater -- and yet it hasn't interfered with her use of her iWatch, including having conversations. Audio and visual are easy to hear and see. No downsides!
customer_reviews.author: Bob Jacobson

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy if active or may get watch wet
customer_reviews.text: The product took 3 weeks to deliver. I already knew this so did not remove stars for this. I hated that next day of arrival run with watch and was not able to turn off running application due to all the sweat it collected. Will keep but not sure how long will keep using as it’s a pain to remove bands to remove cover and stop application as nothing really worked due to all the sweat it had.
customer_reviews.author: FS Real Reviews

customer_reviews.title: Meh it works
customer_reviews.text: This is a lil difficult to get on the series 3 apple watches and then when they are on I've noticed a rainbow looking effect it's pretty anoying. So I've only used it a few times. I'm glad I had it on one time tho as I know knicked the wall and the cover took the damage it got white paint or a scuff on it pretty easy they wont come off but I'd rather it be on this then my watch any day. Another issue is the texture on the screen when this is in it's got a weird ribbed style feel.
customer_reviews.author: Drew tuTWENTY

customer_reviews.title: Dialed 911 -- twice -- the first night after I got it.
customer_reviews.text: This cover dialed 911 emergency services TWICE and sent emergency texts to my family on the first night I wore it to bed. Apparently something in the way I sleep puts pressure on the case which triggered the emergency calls. Unacceptable. It's getting returned
customer_reviews.author: Phillip W. Lamb

customer_reviews.title: Amazing when around dust and dirt!
customer_reviews.text: I work for a little company called SERVPRO. I’m in and out homes and business that wet, humid, and dirty and disgusting. On some jobs, I’m doing a lot of demo which creates drywall dust, sawdust, and sweat and grime. These covers do an AMAZING job protecting my watch from water and dust! I just ordered by second box because the case takes all the scratches and not my watch. Love them!
customer_reviews.author: Spencer Imlah

customer_reviews.title: Too easy to get moisture under the protector during everyday use
customer_reviews.text: Fit well on my Apple Watch, easy to operate the touch screen, but in the end much too easy for moisture to get between the screen protector and the watch during everyday activity . After takining it off a couple of times to remove moisture in the first three days of use, I gave up and went back to my soft film protector. They do warn of possible moisture intrusion, but way too easy. Oh well, was not that expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Jan Shumate

customer_reviews.title: Will Ruin Your Watch Dial
customer_reviews.text: I only used it for a little while, but it messed up my watch dial. I’m very careful with my watch - that’s why I bought this, to be even more careful. Not only does it turn yellow after only a short use, now my dial doesn’t work right. It came with a set of two cases, but after the first one messed up my dial, I’m throwing the other one in the trash.
customer_reviews.author: JY

customer_reviews.title: Works well!
customer_reviews.text: This product is very helpful in keeping my Apple Watch scratch free however it is a little difficult to take off, the clear case gets caught in the band groves. Gets dirty underneath the case very quick especially if working with children (teaching, babysitter, daycare,etc). I have found that it cleans best just use it a cloth to rub the foggy like film off. Overall it does its job and I’m pleased with the purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: moisture gets under the protector
customer_reviews.text: this screen protector is super easy to put on. It does a great job protecting the watch and you can barely tell its on. However, the first time I exercised it got moisture underneath. It happened every time I exercised and I had to take it off. I'm very disappointed as this is the best screen protector I've found (and I've tried a bunch!)
customer_reviews.author: norwich34

customer_reviews.title: fogs super easily and hazes
customer_reviews.text: i feel so much more confident wearing my watch around now that i dont have to worry about small dings. application is pretty easy with the small fact that taking of the apple watch is some what challenging to clean. this is kinda of a me problem but i thought i should add it in whenever i wash dishes or workout it begins to fog and the only way to clean the fog is to take it off and wipe it if you don't itll begin to haze into a foggy brown. for the price point it holds up pretty well it comes in a set of 2 with wipes to clean your watch before application.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Liang

customer_reviews.title: Annoying when it gets wet.
customer_reviews.text: I need this having two kids and working at a vet clinic I knew I would need something protective on my watch right away. Personally I don’t like the rubber one. It’s hard to see sometimes and when you get sweaty or a little wet it’s impossible to get the water out without taking your band off your watch to take off the protective part and dry it. Pretty annoying. Other wise nice to have. I would recommend the plastic one for switching out if you swim more. This is nice because I have yet to get a scratch or crack on it like my last one. 😊
customer_reviews.author: Bethel Lauver

customer_reviews.title: Scuffed up
customer_reviews.text: I got my boyfriend an Apple Watch for Father’s Day and wanted to be sure he didn’t destroy the screen of it at work so I bought these covers as an addition to his gift. They’re definitely protecting it, however these cases scuff SO easily. We’ve already scuffed two of them to a point of no return. I will be looking for a different brand in the near future to see if I can find protectors that will be less temporary.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This is just what I needed! Yes, I had to remove the wristband to install the case but that means it can’t slip off! It fits my watch perfectly & I have no problems using the touch screen. So far, it is scratch resistant ( I couldn’t get the rating for scratch resistance to accept my rating of 5 so, that is why it is blank). I highly recommend this to anyone owning an Apple Watch.
customer_reviews.author: Mavis McKeown

customer_reviews.title: looks dreadful
customer_reviews.text: This product was very disappointing. The case did not stick to the apple watch screen so there was an air layer in between making it difficult to read your watch and the aesthetic look is terrible as a result. I also found after a few days that dust & dirt got into the gap between watch face and the cover making damage to the watch face more likely. I threw it away after 1 week.
customer_reviews.author: james

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: I believe it's going to do the job. This is a soft flexible rubber. I thought it was a hard plastic case when I purchased it. I work on projects all the time and needed something to protect my watch from scratches. I'm not for sure if it'll protect the screen from cracking if it comes into contact with a little force. Maybe about 25% more protection from cracking the screens, which is better than nothing.
customer_reviews.author: Ouch

customer_reviews.title: It works but not when water gets in there
customer_reviews.text: Pros: it protects the watch from getting scratched It fits well Easy installation Pretty sturdy Cons: When moisture, sweat or water gets in there, touch screen would not function and you would have to take it off and wipe it down. It is pretty cumbersome. Many pros but the con is big enough for me to make me not buy again
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy Byun

customer_reviews.title: Swear gets under the case and impairs the screen!!
customer_reviews.text: When I first put this on my watch, I loved it! I knew it would easily protect the screen. However, after wearing it for a few hours, I realized when I began sweating that it impaired my ability to use the screen of my watch. The sweat got underneath the case. So, if you don’t plan on using your watch to workout, this may work for you!
customer_reviews.author: Marissa

customer_reviews.title: Not for 'blue collar' workers!
customer_reviews.text: The ratings for this product were great; therefore, I gave it a try. My husband and son work outside and need to have a protective covering on their watches. The 'case' does not allow for accurate use of the watch touch screen, and if any water comes in contact with the watch, it traps the water and the touchscreen feature is almost non-existent. They have to continually remove the 'protector' from their watch to dry it out to actually use it.
customer_reviews.author: Krista Goodzinski

customer_reviews.title: Protects well and easy install
customer_reviews.text: Works great as a protector and does not affect touch screen usage at all. The only thing I don’t like is I constantly get moisture underneath because of frequent hand washing and because it’s clear it shows any sneaky dirt that gets underneath. But it does protect the watch well. Kinda rubbery so I was able to install without removing my watch straps
customer_reviews.author: Alecia Decker

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the price
customer_reviews.text: I’ve learned the hard way that the Apple Watch can scratch and break easier than I thought possible. This product works as described and will protect the watch from various forms of damage. The only downside is that water easily gets trapped between the watch face and the protector. It’s a bit of a pain when washing your hands throughout the day. Otherwise, I’m happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Wished it was a bit thinner, but it still feels protected.
customer_reviews.text: I thought the instructions were clear, so I did what it said, and it looks pretty nice. I wished it was thinner, because at times, the watch can not read my fingerprint or my movement. I feel like I would have to press a bit harder. Other than that, I haven't dropped it so far since I ordered it, but it seems to be holding up and hasn't warped yet. Pretty happy so far!
customer_reviews.author: CheenaIsNumbah1

customer_reviews.title: Full Protection
customer_reviews.text: Originally we tried the popular screen protector but when applied that left a bunch of bubbles and it just didn't look good so we tried this one. Really like it. It's just a plastic case but it protects the entire watch (except the back with the charging area). Makes a nice tight fit. Doesn't slip or slide around. Every easy to install. I'll be interested to see how durable it is and how long it lasts looking nice.
customer_reviews.author: RickG

customer_reviews.title: Consider your activities first
customer_reviews.text: I installed the case, and I was interested to see how it was going to hold up. Seeing as you are looking through plastic, it is not perfectly clear but it is good. I am a woodworker and had a problem with fine dust from sanding getting under the case. When I swam, water would get inside the case and cause water spots. That said, the case does a good job of protecting the watch from bumps, scratches, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: It does the job
customer_reviews.text: I do like the overall level of protection the protector provides. It's soft which can make for a more challenging removal for cleaning purposes. I run with my watch, and it seems to resist the leeching of sweat moreso than harder rigid plastic covers. It does look a little odd at first with the regular apple watch finish, but I'd rather have a safe watch than a shattered one.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher D. Magee

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed
customer_reviews.text: This product is exactly what I was looking for. It doesn’t add much size to the watch, and protects the screen and the watch itself from scratches. It was a little difficult getting it on the watch, but once I got it on fit perfectly. The screen protector that came with it was useless, it didn’t work. But I didn’t even need it, because it’s self does the job. The touch screen on the watch still works perfectly also. I would highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: dbh2382

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy-stays cloudy!
customer_reviews.text: Wow. This stays cloudy and not clear at all. A waste. Do not buy. There’s a film on this product that remains even after cleaning it. I am disappointed. On the positive side the touch screen works perfectly. Would be nice to have a better-clearer view of the watch face, though.
customer_reviews.author: Claud T

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it......
customer_reviews.text: Horrible screen view in sunlight, even with watch on full brightness. One of my cases came right out the box with a defect right near the middle of the screen, which was absolutely annoying. As soon as sweat got on the watch, it made its way in to the case with ease, causing it to click stuff on its own. Would not recommend this case
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Scratches and marks are staying easily on the case!
customer_reviews.text: Update on my review after using this case for 1 month! The case is very easily damaging and every time you touch from some hard surface marks and scratches are staying on the case and make your watch display look scratched and bad! Any time you wash your hands, you must take the case out and wipe or dry before you put back! By the way it’s protecting the screen of my watch which is the main reason, but could’ve be much better quality than this and design can be improved too!
customer_reviews.author: Trey Chapman

customer_reviews.title: Good Protection
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product! My only issue is that it holds humidity, water or sweat and it becomes inresponsive. I am a very active person and having to take it off and put it on everyday becomes a hassle. This is the third time I purchase it because it is the best case out there. It protects the entire watch and it is marked at an unbeatable price . Durability would have received a perfect score, but with enough physical activity and time it will gain a yellow-ish color.
customer_reviews.author: Yanniel

customer_reviews.title: Seriously brilliant quality case!
customer_reviews.text: These cases are brilliant! They are easy to fit, just remove the straps and slip it over the watch and pop the straps back on. The screen is very responsive once fitted and it looks good and is hardly noticeable. Very, very happy with this protective case. Julk customer service is absolutely fantastic too! Great company to deal with.
customer_reviews.author: amgp2

product_meta.title: Julk Series 3 42mm Case for Apple Watch Screen Protector, iWatch Overall Protective Case TPU HD Clear Ultra-Thin Cover for Apple Watch Series 3 (42mm)
feature_bullets: Notice: This Case Fits for Series 3 42mm (2017). Please Search "Julk" for Other Sizes/Version.

Kindly Remind: Using this product at gym or sports activities may cause the moisture (from perspiration) to be trapped between this product and the watch screen. This is due to the nature of the product as it does not stick to the screen. When there are fog between the case and the screen, please clean the water mist as shown.
This case with screen protector is designed to offer external surface protection to your apple watch. It's smooth, crystal clear TPU case.
It protects the screen and four sides, Scratch-proof.
What You Get: 2 x HD transparent Case with Screen Protector for Apple Watch Series 3 42mm

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars12,913 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
